alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Macon; Peach; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:31PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Macon, southwestern Bibb, Peach, north central Houston, southern Crawford and east central Taylor Counties through 815 PM EST... At 730 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was near Nakomis, or 8 miles west of Fort Valley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Reynolds, Nakomis, Jack Brown Estates, Potterville, Lakewood, Powerville, Lee Pope, Horns and Miami Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Bibb; Crawford; Houston; Macon; Peach; Taylor
